Package org.trellisldp.http

Trellis HTTP Interfaces

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentAuthorizationFilter
    A ContainerRequestFilter that converts a Principal into an IRI-based WebID.
    CacheControlFilter
    A ContainerResponseFilter that adds Cache-Control headers to all GET responses.
    CrossOriginResourceSharingFilter
    A ContainerResponseFilter that adds CORS-related headers to HTTP responses.
    HttpBasedBinaryService
    A BinaryService implementation that stores LDP-NR resources at HTTP locations via GET and PUT.
    LdpResource
    A ContainerRequestFilter that also matches path-based HTTP resource operations.
    MultipartUploader
    An HTTP-based mechanism for uploading large LDP-NR resources via multi-part (chunked) operations.
    WebAcFilter
    A ContainerRequestFilter that implements WebAC-based authorization.

Package org.trellisldp.http Description

Trellis HTTP Interfaces

This package provides the core HTTP interfaces for accessing and manipulating repository resoures.
